treatment.taxon_hierarchy: family Asteraceae;tribe Gnaphalieae;genus Antennaria;species friesiana;subspecies friesiana;
treatment.description: Gynoecious (staminates unknown). Plants 3.5–12.5 cm. Stolons 0.5–1 cm. Cauline leaves 7–14 mm. Heads 2–4. Involucres: staminate unknown; pistillate 6–7 mm. Corollas staminate unknown; pistillate 3.5–4 mm. Cypselae 1–2 mm; pappi: staminate unknown; pistillate 4–4.5 mm. 2n = 56, 63, 100+.

habitat_info.text: arctic and alpine tundra , on or near dry rocky outcrops or sand ridges ;
habitat_info.habitat: arctic and alpine tundra on or near dry rocky outcrops or sand ridges

treatment.discussion: The sexual progenitors of subsp. friesiana are subspp. alaskana and neoalaskana.
